journey.title: Strategic Impact
content: I lead multi-brand experience strategies across web, app, and connected platforms—unifying consumer journeys while driving measurable business outcomes. At a leading automotive group, I improved operational efficiency by +60% and boosted experience impact by +12% through analytics, A/B testing, and AI-driven personalization.

I've also scaled UX organizations to 145 designers across 7 hubs and created enterprise-level design systems that improved global consistency by +80%. I partner with Product, Engineering, Marketing, and IoT teams to align around shared KPIs—turning UX into a strategic growth driver.
